title: At the Court's Mercy
description: What happens when an unseen tragedy occurs? Life begins to unravel and skeletons begin to leap out of the closet - as in the case of Nasir, a young man haunted by his past and torn between street life and fatherhood. Forget the fact that his baby momma is going ballistic! What about his jump-offs and his new fling that is Driven to the point of no return? Watch how Nasir's mother, a vengeful scorned woman and his baby momma's enraged insecurities dramatize his life. Will Nasir be a father to his child or will he fold under pressure?
author: KaShamba Williams
